title: Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha2 released - Second iteration of our Jakarta EE 10 stream
content: We already presented our Quarkus 3 effort here, here and here. Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha2 is the continuation of this effort. On the Jakarta EE 10 front, it doesnâ€™t bring anything new, several things are in the works to be integrated in the next Alpha, but it is based on 2.14.3.Final (the...
